item.title: Asyncio Note
item.description: Starting async function without await Async function in asyncio cannot start directly. It should be wrapped in asyncio.create_task. The asyncio.ensure_future can also be used. But create_task() (added in Python 3.7) is the preferable way for spawning new tasks. Call usual function asynchronously with event loop start on next tick: loop.call_soon(func) delay for some time before start: loop.call_later(delay, func) start at a time: loop.call_at(when, func) See in asyncio event loop.
